v0Prompt: Create a beautiful Matrix Glass themed landing page for Tissaia - an AI photo restoration app. Use dark green theme (#0a1f0a) with emerald accents (#10b981, #00ff41). Include: 1) Hero section with headline 'Restore Memories with AI', showing a before/after photo comparison slider. 2) 4-step workflow visualization (Upload > Analyze > Restore > Download) as animated cards. 3) Features grid with 6 cards using lucide icons. 4) Damage types showcase with severity badges (scratches, fading, tears, water damage, mold, creases). 5) Before/After gallery section with 3 example restorations. 6) Tech stack section with React, Rust, Gemini logos. Use glassmorphism cards, subtle glow effects, smooth hover animations. Font: Inter for body, JetBrains Mono for technical text. Responsive design with mobile-first approach.
